attr.title: Liz & Laz
attr.desc: A freak accident scatters the control cubes, and Liz and Laz must team up to recover them! Liz must use a life-sized game controller, jumping on buttons to guide Laz safely through a hazardous landscape to collect the cubes.
attr.desc_md:
A freak accident destabilizes the stabilizer, and the control cubes go missing. Liz and Laz must work together to secure them! Laz transports into a hazardous landscape and relies on directions from Liz to keep him safe.

### Features:
- As Liz, you'll issue controls to Laz remotely. Liz uses a life-sized game controller to tell Laz to move, jump, and shoot. She jumps on buttons to guide Laz to the control cubes.
- Secure twelve control cubes across twelve stages
- Colorful, dangerous world
- Inventive indirect control system provides unique platforming action
- Completely reconfigurable keyboard and gamepad controls
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/liz-laz-1). Extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://jdmgames.itch.io/liz-laz-1). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
